version_description:
Attempted to prevent setup error message wrongly showing if the match has finished
Fixed crash when human playing match against certain U21 teams who loaned out all their players
Fixed display issue after viewing GameCenter on iOS14
Fixed duplicated competition history for some competitions at start of game
Fixed Asan FC still wrongly set as being military club
Fixed game not filling screen on some iPhones in zoomed mode
Fixed incorrect image being used for some set piece taker distribution tabs
Fixed misleading layout on player achievements screen
Fixed national team callup news showing wrong nation
Fixed rare transfer related crash
Fixed selection of set piece instructions on some 32 bit devices
Fixed some clubs having squad numbers impossible to see on kits when assigning
Fixed Spanish second teams always being 'off-season' in coach report
Fixed text cut-off on training report page
Fixed trail when dragging tile on tactics screen
Made swiping a little more sensitive

Fixed some players wrongly not at club at start
Fixed error message after match
Fixed assistant accepting loans with buyouts
Fixed various rare crashes
Fixed incorrect manager/staff image
Fixed corner exploit
Fixed B-team offer to club news
Improved set-piece distribution
Tweaked manager reputation growth
Fixed many other issues

Fixed issue where it was possible to get stuck responding to news item
Fixed rare captaincy crash
Fixed issue with second season transfer budget in Italy when No Transfer Budget in First Window on
Further fix for manager pictures

12.2.0
Winter Transfer Update
Many other improvements and bug fixes

FM21 Mobile | 12.2.1
Fix for issue with winter transfer update where some users with really old saves would have award and stadium names scrambled

FM21 Mobile | 12.3.0

New database with Russia and China transfers
Updated translations
Prevented human managers from having their coaching badge decline due to age
Fixed unlockable news items not working for responses and visibility in all cases
Optimised processing performance
Fixed issue where end-of-season auction clear down could lead to inaccurate player unhappiness news
Ensured that unhappy at transfer rejection news is always delivered for players in human reserve/B-teams
Increased height of text box in Player Retraining menu.
Fixed number of unread messages cutoff
Fixed issue where the award name wasn't clearly visible on the player achievements
Fixed grammatical issue in a news item
Fixed Player Relationships card when it's a manager
Add news effect to remind the user they shortlisted a player if a news item appears for his contract expiry
Added new strings to personality feedback for players on loan and fixed issue with logic
Lowered reliability of loan players somewhat according to their professionalism
Fixed some start page buttons not highlighting when clicked
Removed South Korea from being able to run The Saviour Cometh
Prevented bankruptcy (and other financial) news items from appearing for reserve teams
Fixed some young players starting with zero value
Fixed 'terminate affiliation' option not displaying on HD skins
Fixed an issue with some dates of birth being a day out

FM21 Mobile | 12.3.1

Fixed rare issue that could cause saved game to fail to load
Fixed issue where manager could appear at two clubs
Fixed issue where some stadium names were wrong
